title: Cinderella Thyme
description: A chance meeting with a mysterious man at a club called Slave changes eighteen-year-old Thyme Smytheson’s life, awakening her submissive desires. Cinderella Thyme is a story about redemption, forgiveness and second chances. All the characters from Mia Natasha’s debut novel, Cinderella Club, return for this revealing flashback-filled sequel.
author: Mia Natasha
